directions: Blend all ingredients except beans with salt and pepper to taste in a blender until a coarse purée.
Cook beans in boiling salted water until crisp-tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Transfer to a bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking, then drain well.
Toss beans with half of pesto, or to taste.
ingredients: 4 lb haricots verts or other thin green beans, trimmed
title: Green Beans with Pecan Pesto
